## AbstractMap.forEach() method

Calls `callbackFn` once for each key-value pair present in the map. If a `thisArg` parameter is provided to `forEach`<!-- -->, it will be used as the `this` value for each callback.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEach(callbackFn: (value: V, key: K, map: AbstractMap<K, V>) => void, thisArg?: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callbackFn | (value: V, key: K, map: [AbstractMap](./calcium.abstractmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;K, V&gt;) =&gt; void | Function to execute for each entry in the map. |
|  thisArg | any | Value to use as this when executing callback. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
